title: [Medicine] The coronavirus may cause fat cells to miscommunicate, leading to diabetes. COVID-19 patients with high blood sugar had low levels of a hormone made by fat.

[Biology] Children develop robust and sustained cross-reactive spike-specific immune responses to SARS-CoV-2 infection. Study shows that immune responses to SARS-CoV-2 are higher in children, retained for 12 months or longer and can neutralize Alpha, Beta and Delta variants.
